sentences.en: Carrie scowled. The effect was something so quaint and droll it caught even the manager.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉做出愁眉苦脸的样子.效果十分奇妙而可笑,连经理也被吸引住了.

sentences.en: Evelyn is entertaining company, with droll and sardonic observations on nearly everything.
sentences.cn: 伊芙琳以其对几乎每件事情都冷嘲式的方式和离奇可笑的见解娱乐伙伴。

sentences.en: He is so droll, that Samson.
He looked at her with a droll sort of awakening.
sentences.cn: 他用一种古怪的如梦方醒的神情看着她.

sentences.en: He screwed up his mouth in a droll fashion.
sentences.cn: 他扭着嘴装出一副可笑的样子.

sentences.en: His droll expression seemed to say that he had found the secret of contentment.
sentences.cn: 他那种滑稽可笑的表情似乎在说明他已经发现了知足常乐的秘诀.

sentences.en: His face was screwed up in a droll fashion.
sentences.cn: 他的脸扭成一副可笑的模样.

sentences.en: His style is at times droll, satirical, yet sympathetic.
sentences.cn: 他的写作风格时而滑稽, 时而讽刺, 有时又饱含同情.

sentences.en: The band have a droll sense of humour.
sentences.cn: 这个乐队有一种滑稽古怪的幽默感。
